description: The services of an Architectural firm, acting as Prime Consultant, are required to undertake the design and construction administration services needed to facilitate the implementation of a new detachment and storage garage in Rosthern, Saskatchewan for the RCMP.

full_summary:
# Government of Canada Tender Notice

### Architectural and Engineering Services for New Police Facility in Rosthern, Saskatchewan

#### Reference Number: cb-363-17545349

#### Solicitation Number: M5000-23-4451/A

#### Publication Date: April 2024

#### Tender Closing Date: May 22, 2024 4:00 PM

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified Canadian Architectural and Engineering (A&E) firms to submit a proposal for the design and construction administration services for a new police detachment facility in Rosthern, Saskatchewan.

#### Project Overview

The RCMP seeks a Prime Consultant (Architectural firm) to provide a full consulting team, including expertise in civil, structural, mechanical, electrical, landscape architecture, sustainable development, commissioning, costing, and building/fire code. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, managing, and administering the construction of the new detachment facility.

#### Key Requirements

* Design and construct a new police detachment facility of approximately 937m2, plus a detached storage garage building of approximately 70m2
* Provide a full consulting team, including expertise in various disciplines
* Develop and manage the contract for the construction of the facility
* Ensure compliance with RCMP program requirements and standards
* Possess experience in delivering similar projects in Canada

#### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: May 22, 2024 4:00 PM
* Expected Contract Start Date: Not Specified
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified

#### Contracting Entity

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)

#### Contact Information

Teresa Hengen
Contracting Authority, RCMP
Email: teresa.hengen@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
Phone: (639) 625-3449
Fax: 306-780-5232

#### Documents

All tender documents are available electronically on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at Canadabuyss <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities>. A security requirement is associated with the requirement. Please refer to the attached tender documents for further information.
